short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your communication by creating unlimited free screen recordings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bloom is a brand new chrome extension created to boost your productivity and improve communication impact by providing a quick and free access to screen recording.

Unlike other chrome extensions, it doesn't require the permission to read and change data on all websites. Which means that it is only active right after you open it by clicking the extension icon.

Unlike other screen recording extensions, Bloom does not have a limit on free screen recordings which means you can communicate openly without restrictions.
